frontMatter.title: Market Feedback Capture
frontMatter.metaDescription: Build mechanisms to continuously feed the product development team with user feedback, sales team findings, competition behavior, and support team findings.

checklist.question: What is your strategy for capturing market feedback?
checklist.expectation: A mechanism should be in place to allow the product development team to know market feed.

checklist.question: How you utilize market feedback in the product development process?
checklist.expectation: Received market feedback should be managed and utilized in product development (e.g. feature designing, UX improvements, etc)
